channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Blog Designer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Blog Designer

item.title: CVE-2022-4793|2024-08-03T01:48:40.465Z -- unknown -- blog%20designer
item.description: The Blog Designer WordPress plugin before 2.4.1 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack.
